getDefaultConstructor

public static java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?> getDefaultConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
Returns the default Constructor of the given class. The default constructor is identified with annotated DefaultConstructor annotation.

Parameters:
clazz - the given class
Returns:
returns the default constructor if it exists, if not, return null.
Throws:
InOutDependencyException - throws this exception if there are more than one default constructor.
See Also:
DefaultConstructor
